full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement - RFP for Sustainable Aviation Fuel**

**Reference Number:** WS4129155920
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Date of Publication:** August 16, 2023
**Closing Date:** October 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the supply and delivery of Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton.

**Request Details:**

* The requirement is for the supply of up to 11 million litres of finished, blended aviation turbine fuel containing 30% by volume of synthetic hydrocarbon components.
* The supply of fuel is required before March 31, 2025.
* The requirement is broken down into a firm 7 million litres of fuel with four additional 1 million litre options.

**Trade Agreements:**

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Key Contacts:**

* Bobbi MacLeod (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information:**

Please note that the closing time for this solicitation has been amended to October 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by this time to be considered responsive.

You can find more information about this solicitation on Ariba Discovery or Canada Buys. Interested suppliers should review the tender documents carefully and ensure they meet the requirements before submitting a proposal. Only electronic bids will be accepted.  [1](http://discovery.ariba.com/r
